name: Remove Monster Immunities
description: Reduces maximum elemental resistances of monsters to remove their immunities in nightmare and hell difficulties.
author: olegbl

config.name: Maximum Resistance
config.description: Sets monster resistances to a maximum of this value.

config.name: Disable Monster Affixes
config.description: Disable certain monster affixes (Enchanted, Stone Skin, Resistant) that increase reistances and can cause the monsters to become immune even with a lower than 100 maximum resistance.

config.name: Adjust Bosses
config.description: Adjust certain bosses (such as Uber Baal) to ensure they do not gain immunities due to their special hard coded affixes.
